io.spine.client

Class QueryBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.client.TargetBuilder<io.spine.client.Query,QueryBuilder>
      • io.spine.client.QueryBuilder

  • public final class QueryBuilder
extends TargetBuilder<io.spine.client.Query,QueryBuilder>
    A builder for the Query instances.

    None of the parameters set by the builder methods are required. Call QueryBuilder.build() to retrieve the resulting Query instance.

    Usage example: 

    
 ActorRequestFactory factory = ... ;
 Query query = factory.query()
          .select(Customer.class)
          .byId(westCoastCustomerIds())
          .withMask("name", "address", "email")
          .where(eq("type", "permanent"),
                 eq("discountPercent", 10),
                 eq("companySize", Company.Size.SMALL))
          .orderBy("name", ASCENDING)
          .limit(20)
          .build();

    Arguments for the TargetBuilder.where(Filter...) method can be composed using the Filters utility class.

    See Also:
    Filters, TargetBuilder
